content: meet the utopia neutral pumpkin with its soft understated tones and classic silhouette this elegant piece complements any décor - from cosy cottage to chic contemporary a timeless classic it s quick to crochet and beautifully refined - the utopia neutral pumpkin will add a touch of sophistication to your seasonal displays whether styled solo or grouped with other autumn accents it s the perfect blend of simplicity and elegance for your handmade home **yarn suggestion ** utopia country wool aran used in photos 100% wool yarn worsted weight aran #4 100g 170m suggested colours below however any colours can work for this pattern 1 ball oatmeal cw16 **finished size ** 57 cm 22 4 diameter x 11 5 cm 4 5 high hook size s 5mm us size h/8 pattern will work in other hooks and yarns though finished size may be different you will also need a yarn needle stitch markers scissors gauge 5dc = 3 5cm 1 4 obtaining the correct gauge is not critical for this project if you like this pattern then please come check out my other designs https //www ravelry com/designers/heather-c-gibbs-kcacouk this pattern is c designed by heather gibbs 2025 in collaboration with utopia crafts and is for personal use only not for resale patterns are not to be copied sold or distributed however you are welcome to donate gift as well as sell any of your finished items if you are an individual crafter if you sell your work online please credit the work as appropriate and link to my pages where you can thank you
